why * bad *: The loss of tree cover has a number of negative effects on the planet such as animal extinction, climate change, etc .

Trees are essential to the water cycle . In the rainforest ecosystem, over half the water is held within plants as absorbed rainfall and three quarters of the world‚Äôs freshwater is supplied by forest catchments .
Without the roots of trees to anchor the soil, it washes away including the nutrients contained in the soil .
If soil erosion is not stopped it can ultimately turn the land into desert .
In the Amazon, the loss of a critical mass of rain forest could trick further dieback moving the forest into a vicious circle of self reinforcing destruction .
